masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "I asked your parents to come in for a special holiday conference. Your grades have slipped, you sleep in class, and you keep leaving for 'bathroom breaks' during emergencies. I care about you, and I'm worried. Let's talk—with your parents present."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Explain your grade slip without revealing hero work
  • Keep your parents calm—they're already stressed
  • Convince Mrs. Rodriguez you're not in trouble
